channel.title: idea on alexchiri.com
channel.description: Recent content in idea on alexchiri.com

item.title: I have an idea
item.description: I have an idea about a revolutionary recipe website. Yeah, you read it right, a recipe website. Being a software engineer, you would think that it should be easy for me to build it and launch it, basically it’s something I do every day for my employer. But as you might have found out, shipping is not that simple. Stuck in preparation I had this idea for several years now and I started to make it happen, I think, about 4 or 5 times.
